topics.body: The Only real Drawback to Full Armor ZZ is that it loses the ability to transform into the G-fortress mode. (The firepower does balance that out though.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body: I think I've figured out why this show works as well as it does. Because it allows things like Hulk and Thor thumb wrestling, Cap trying to make jokes, Tony making a child sized version of his armor, and a bunch of other weird goofy shit to happen. It never takes it's characters or setting TOO seriously. But it also never goes completely off-the-wall wacky either. It finds a nice warm niche right in the middle and just gets cozy.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
